page.title: 14kYLIE THOMPSON'S DAY 1985
page.content: I get up in the morning between 7.00 and 7.30,wash and get dressed.Then I make breakfast for my brother and myself-usually toasted cheese and cherryade.After breakfast I play with my dogs,Gemma and Bodie before leaving for school at about 8.30.At school the first lesson is English,then assembly then playtime.After play is Maths-I enjoy that. I go home for my dinner and have something like bacon,fried bread and fried potatoes.I go back to school at 12.30 and we start at 1.00 with project and then do P.E.When I go home at 3.15 I watch television until 5.15 then have my tea(usually a salad or something).After that I play(maybe two-ball or something like that) then I watch television again until 10.00. I read for about 30 mins until its bedtime at 10.45.
